sentences.sContent: Whenever he was angry, he would begin to stammer slightly.
sentences.sCn: 他一生气说话就开始有点结巴。
本结结巴巴地道了个歉。

trans.tranOther: to speak with a lot of pauses and repeated sounds, either because you have a speech problem, or because you are nervous, excited etc
a speech problem which makes someone speak with a lot of pauses and repeated sounds
